ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This study utilized the facilities and resources of the MUSC Center for Oral Health Research (COHR). This study was supported by a grant from the Musculoskeletal Transplant Foundation (JC), the National Institute of Health, the National Institute of Aging [NIH-NIA PO1-AG036675] (ME, WDH) and in part by the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA Merit Award BX000333, ACL; 1I01CX000930-01, WDH). The contents of this publication do not represent the views of the Department of Veterans Affairs or the United States Government. R.N.H. and E.D. are funded through a training grant from the National Institutes of Health National Institute of Dental and Craniofacial Research [5T32DE017551], and S.H. is funded through a fellowship from the National Institutes of Health National Institute of Dental and Craniofacial Research [5F32DE02471202]. The MUSC Center for Oral Health Research (COHR) is partially supported by the National Institutes of Health National Institute of General Medicine [P30GM103331]. The authors like to thank Galina Kondrikova and Dr. Sudharsan Periyasamy-Thandavan for their help with this study.
